headline: The battle for Pepsi’s future has begun
summary: PepsiCo is losing the soda wars to Coca-Cola. That’s nothing new. But after it fell into third place behind Dr Pepper, a heavyweight activist investor said Tuesday that the company needs a drastic shakeup.

raw.headline: The battle for Pepsi’s future has begun
raw.summary: PepsiCo is losing the soda wars to Coca-Cola. That’s nothing new. But after it fell into third place behind Dr Pepper, a heavyweight activist investor said Tuesday that the company needs a drastic shakeup.

summary: Trump tariffs and big food breakups. Welcome to September.

headline: Elliott Investment Management takes stake in Pepsi, sees 50% upside for the stock
summary: The activist investor's $4 billion stake in PepsiCo comes as the soda and snack giant battles slowing demand and fierce competition.

raw.headline: Elliott Investment Management takes stake in Pepsi, sees 50% upside for the stock
raw.summary: The activist investor's $4 billion stake in PepsiCo comes as the soda and snack giant battles slowing demand and fierce competition.

headline: Kraft Heinz Stock Falls on Breakup News. How the Split Would Work.
summary: Kraft Heinz will divide into one company focusing on the global market for sauces, spreads and seasonings while the second will target selling grocery staples in North America.

raw.headline: Kraft Heinz Stock Falls on Breakup News. How the Split Would Work.
raw.summary: Kraft Heinz will divide into one company focusing on the global market for sauces, spreads and seasonings while the second will target selling grocery staples in North America.

headline: Wall Street Lunch: PepsiCo Gains On News Of Elliott Investment's $4B Stake
summary: Shares of PepsiCo are gaining ground on the heels of reports that Elliott Investment Management has accumulated a substantial stake in the company.
